Monitor.​ViewApp.​Model.​Component
PropertyChangedBase
public
Monitor.​ViewApp.​Model.​Component

Component class stores the component data.  The class inherits from PropertyChangedBase -> Caliburn.Micro helper which implements INotifyPropertyChanged in order to update the UI when there is a change in the data.

true if this instance is expanded; otherwise, false.
